_description: Four types of worthy men, in a Latin sermon de ascensione domini — four monorhyming lines

CULIi38.Transcription:
Gode werkemen foul of werynesVylemen ful of worthynesdomesmen
                    ful of rythwysnes& douttyme ful of hardynese
CULIi38.Note:
Preceded f. 144 by ‘werkemen & worthymen / domusmen &
                    douttymen’.
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 13.
